title: synth executor
description: runs cdk synth for the given stack

defaultStackName.description: default stackName if none is provided

local.description: denotes to run local synth or not

strictStackNameChecking.description: prevents stacks that don't satisfy stackNameRegex from being created

stackNameRegexString.description: regex that must be satisfied for a stackName to be valid

selectStackNameBasedOnCurrentGitBranch.description: flag denoting if stack name should be selected based on current git branch

gitBranchToCorrespondingStackName.description: object representing a map of {[key: gitBranch]: stackName}
